vs_5_0
dcl_globalFlags refactoringAllowed
dcl_constantbuffer cb4[3], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb5[15], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb7[18], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb0[1], immediateIndexed
dcl_constantbuffer cb1[7], immediateIndexed
dcl_input v0.xyz
dcl_input v1.xyzw
dcl_input v2.xyzw
dcl_output_siv o0.xyzw, position
dcl_output o1.xyzw
dcl_output o2.xyzw
dcl_output o3.xyzw
dcl_output o4.xyzw
dcl_output o5.xyzw
dcl_output o6.xyzw
dcl_output o7.xyzw
dcl_output o8.xyzw
dcl_temps 4
// 3DMigoto StereoParams:
dcl_resource_texture2d (float,float,float,float) t125

ld_indexable(texture2d)(float,float,float,float) r3.xyzw, l(0, 0, 0, 0), t125.xyzw

mov r0.xyz, v0.xyzx
mov r0.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r1.x, cb4[0].xyzw, r0.xyzw
dp4 r1.y, cb4[1].xyzw, r0.xyzw
dp4 r1.z, cb4[2].xyzw, r0.xyzw
mov r1.w, l(1.000000)
dp4 r0.x, cb5[7].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.y, cb5[8].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.z, cb5[9].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 r0.w, cb5[10].xyzw, r1.xyzw
mov o0.xyzw, r0.xyzw

// Automatic vertex shader halo fix inserted with DarkStarSword's asmtool.py:
// asmtool.py --auto-fix-vertex-halo -i --only-autofixed 2d96d68d65a8664a-vs.txt
ne r3.w, r0.w, l(1.0)
if_nz r3.w
  add r3.w, r0.w, -r3.y
  mad r0.x, r3.w, r3.x, r0.x
endif

mov o3.w, r0.x
mov o4.w, r0.y
mov o5.w, r0.z
mov o1.z, r0.w
mov o1.w, l(0)
mov r0.x, v1.w
mov r0.y, v2.w
mov o1.xy, r0.xyxx
mul r2.xyzw, cb0[0].xyzw, cb1[6].xyzw
mad o2.xyzw, r0.xyxy, cb1[5].xyzw, r2.xyzw
dp3 r0.x, cb4[0].xyzx, v2.xyzx
dp3 r0.y, cb4[1].xyzx, v2.xyzx
dp3 r0.z, cb4[2].xyzx, v2.xyzx
dp3 r0.w, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
rsq r0.w, r0.w
mul o3.xyz, r0.wwww, r0.xyzx
dp3 r0.x, cb4[0].xyzx, v1.xyzx
dp3 r0.y, cb4[1].xyzx, v1.xyzx
dp3 r0.z, cb4[2].xyzx, v1.xyzx
dp3 r0.w, r0.xyzx, r0.xyzx
rsq r0.w, r0.w
mul o4.xyz, r0.wwww, r0.xyzx
add o5.xyz, r1.xyzx, -cb5[14].xyzx
mov o6.w, r1.x
dp4 o6.x, cb7[9].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 o6.y, cb7[10].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 o6.z, cb7[11].xyzw, r1.xyzw
mov o7.w, r1.y
dp4 o7.x, cb7[12].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 o7.y, cb7[13].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 o7.z, cb7[14].xyzw, r1.xyzw
mov o8.w, r1.z
dp4 o8.x, cb7[15].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 o8.y, cb7[16].xyzw, r1.xyzw
dp4 o8.z, cb7[17].xyzw, r1.xyzw
ret
// Approximately 47 instruction slots used
